description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout of a Tic Tac Toe game frontend application. It includes variables for light and dark themes, styles for the application header, logo, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, controls text alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Class for the application header, defines layout and background style.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links within the app, manages text color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the theme toggle button, positioning, styling, and transition effects.
